nodes.text: Rachel was a female smuggler living during the Galactic War. Around 3641 BBY Rachel's partner, who was in love with her, was making a delivery run of drills to crime lord Hallen on Belsavis. Unfortunately, his comlink malfunctioned and he had no way to talk with Galactic Republic authorities of Belsavis prison. He managed to record one final message with a declaration of his love to Rachel before being shot down and dying in the crash.
